items.content_html: I haven’t been driving for long (about 1 year), but I’ve always thought that when I have to slow down because an oncoming car is passing an obstacle in the road, the driver has made a mistake - he hasn’t estimated the distance of the oncoming car. Today I made the same mistake. I feel ashamed. 😳

items.title: Micro.publish
items.content_html:
I decided to try the micro.publish plugin for Obsidian made by @otaviocc

so… this is test
items.content_text:
I decided to try the [micro.publish](https://github.com/otaviocc/obsidian-microblog) plugin for Obsidian made by [@otaviocc](https://micro.blog/otaviocc)

so... this is test
🤦 ‍♀️ It's 2023 and I'm trying to fix Windows XP, I didn't see it coming.

😀 So... I removed ribbon and changed the command to check if text is selected before it is allowed to execution. I also removed "whole document posting", It was duplicated - you can select all text if you want to post it all.
🤣 I accidentally posted my note to status lol but deleted it immediately. I need to disable/remove the option to post the whole document.
😄 Published and now waiting for review
😀 Will not be sent to mastodon 🦣
💜 finally can post from my Android phone
🧪 And test (FIXED) - updated how the note about where text was posted looks like.
🧪 And test - updated how the note about where text was posted looks like.
🧪 And test - updated how the note about where text was posted looks like.
🌈 Small update: If text contains an emoji anywhere in the text, that emoji will be used for the status emoji. If there are multiple emoticons, the first one is used.
✨ 😁 Test from obsidian - this is last one i promise 🤞 (for now)...
❓ If I have rss-to-email on the bottom and if I don't select a tag for it, it will send the newsletter to all of them (tagged and untagged subscribers).
🧪 Thinking about moving my domain and mail off from Microsoft 365. Hover i still think it is one of best subscriptions out of there…
🍎 Is it just me or is iOS 17.1 really a lot smoother?
🎁 I got myself an Logitech MX mechanical keyboard Mini and Mx master 3S mouse
😱 We had earthquake and this is first time that phone showed alert. We are all safe…
😁 One bug fixed - another came out
💻 Are you taking part in Hacktoberfest?

🤷‍♀️ I have preordered my iPhone 15 in natural titanium because I like that color, but now, after people posting photos of their phones, I don’t know, it looks different - it’s just gray… and clay silicon case… same, it looks to me as different shade… anyone has this combination here?
🎉 1Password passkeys now working on iPhone and iPad

🍏 I was tempted to get iPhone 14 because it was purple. This years PRO’s colors are boring but I quiet like natural titanium. Also PROs prices are lower comparing last year’s pro. Pro Max has staring price same as last las year Pro max but twice as storage…
💡 Ooo, that’s why Eset agents won’t showed up in the console…
🍑 I want more fruit trees in animal crossings…
🍎 I hope somebody will fix Apple iOS wallpapers…

⌚ My watches are not even scratched and new OS will become available to them in coming months, so no new watches for me, but i bought more watch straps (black and blue one) and I will buy another when lavender become available.
🤑 I haven't bought a game in the last few years, and now that I've bought a Nintendo Switch I'd like to buy almost every 2nd... I have to resist.
🏄 What is SurfShark’s alternative ID? Do anyone here tried it?
📦 ProtonDrive now has Windows desktop application
🙏 Thanks for suggestions I was able to "solve" my problem with payment by buying nintendo's prepaid card...

🤦‍♀️ I got 2 games on my Switch and from this point u was unable to buy anything (games, subscription for online gaming) so I contacted support and it turned out that nintendo somehow blocked my payments (paypal / CC) and they don't know why. And that it shouldn't take more than 30 days (without guarantee), so I should wait. I'm thinking of returning it.
🛡️ I renewed my Surfshark subscription for another two years. I have been using Surfshark for 2years and have had no problems with it. The speed is better than other VPNs I have tried.
❓ I get myself Nintendo switch. Any recommended games?
🤓 Im really tempted to buy Nintendo switch. I had it in my shopping cart many times but every time I removed it before I send order… but now new Zelda…. 🤔
🙃 So the blue-bird site cares about our health and implemented doomscrolling protection?
🏞️ Today we have end of school year and start of 2 months vacation 🥳
😩 it seems to me like it's Friday

🚫 Attention, there is a fake Good Notes App on the Play store (Google) according to my opinion. It has a different icon, app id: is com.goodnotes2.notebook_notepad by M.R. Lee Software. App require email to work but confirmation email wont arrived.

GoodNotes has actually released an android app (currently in beta) but it is only available for Samsung tablets with 8 inches or more. and at least 3GB ram
😦 Changed my microblog account username and new post are now showing only on my blog not the timeline

👿 Still waiting in Diablo IV queue….
💕 I found that I love mulberries

❓ Are you a good driver? When do you know you've made a mistake or misjudged a situation (I don't mean a crash)? When they honk at you? Or is it a gut feeling? What do you do in that case? Do you take a break from driving or do you nod your hand over it and move on?
😮 Fastmail, Protonmail, OMG and many others ❤️1password passkeys and I'm impressed. What a cool and secure feature. (And you can freely combine with YubiKeys as a backup) 👋
🐕 Okay, new Snoopy watch face is really cute
🍎 Anyone here on iO17 Developer beta?
❓ Have any of you already received a Bluesky invitation after registering for the waitlist? Or at least a confirmation email that you are on list?
😁 Can’t wait to try them (passkeys) with 1Password (any idea when they release this feature?)
🌀 From Hugo to Ghost and then to custom blogging app and now back to Hugo…
🥳 Microsoft todo has now Apple Watch app
🔄 I canceled my subscription to micro.blog, I think my social media surfing is getting a bit busy so I'm going to thin it out a bit.
🚗 I travelled about 800km today in the passenger seat of the car and I've had enough. I admire people who can drive that distance.
🎨 I’ve just upgraded my blog theme so that I can use it on Micro.blog as well.

🦉 It’s almost 1am and I’m still not sleeping
🤔 Did you upgrade or do you upgrading your phones just because you like new colors?
🤖 My copilot subscription expired yesterday and I’m already missing him 😊 so I think I’m going to resubscribe soon

items.content_html: I created my own blogging application, not because I don’t like Hugo or because Wordpress is bad. Because I like to do things my own way. Also it is much easier to me implement new features.

❓ Can someone explain me micro.blog purpose and why should I pay for it? Isn’t it similar to mastodon or Twitter? Or what are benefits to using it?

👾 Over time I've bought quite a few games but few-some I've even played. Just read this article from Jose https://www.josemunozmatos.com/blog/apps-and-tech-im-using-to-help-me-finish-more-video-games about how he is tracking his games progress to finish them more. I think I give it try.

🎵 Back on Spotify… I like how currently playing song is synced trough all my devices and even to Discord
⁉️ Are custom MS365 policy rules require an E5 license or it is a pesky bug that prevents me from creating a policy?
👏 GitHub finally allows us to edit code with their android app too (like on the iOS app)
💪 Configured safe links and safe attachments on my 365 account. What’s the next? MDM?
😩 Frustrating part of using Microsoft services: difference of application functionality web/desktop and even mobile apps (iOS vs Android) are different
❓ Does anyone here use iOS focuses?
✨ After a long time, I updated my PHP hydration repository and added support for nested objects
🔁 Moved my Obsidian vaults to OneDrive, and now I have real-time sync between my computers.
🎥 Finally watched Miss Peregrine’s Home for peculiar children. I read the book first a few years ago
